original: Hetu atīto dhammo nahetussa naatītassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava …pe… upanissaye nava …pe… vigate nava.
analyzed: hetu atītaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na atītassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā nava anantare nava pe upanissaye nava pe vigate nava

original: Hetu anāgato dhammo nahetussa naanāgatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.
analyzed: hetu anāgataḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na anāgatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā upanissaye nava
